questions.question: What makes Ajax unique?
choices: It uses C++ as its programming language.
It works the same with all Web browsers.
It works as a stand-alone Web-development tool.

questions.question: What does the XMLHttpRequest object accomplish in Ajax?
choices: It's the programming language used to develop Ajax applications.
It provides the ability to mark up and style the display of Web-page text.
It provides a means of exchanging structured data between the Web server and client.
It provides the ability to asynchronously exchange data between Web browsers and a Web server.
questions.correct: It provides the ability to asynchronously exchange data between Web browsers and a Web server.
